snippet.title: Super Grid Run Beta Gameplay Demo
snippet.description:
Refresh Creations Proudly Presents Super Grid Run!

This beta demo shows off the look and feel of the game, focusing on simplistic one-touch controls, building up to fast paced, retro arcade action. Inspired by Temple Run and Super Hexagon this game is an exciting cross over, based around getting the best score you can muster. 

Featuring the amazing chiptune music from Sycamore Drive by Garry Lee you must dash past the barriers collecting time bonuses to get the highest score you can!

Estimated Release Date: 6th December 2012

Dev Blog: http://www.refreshcreations.co.uk/games/
Game Site: http://www.supergridrun.com/

Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/refreshcreation/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Refresh-Creations-Ltd/125945550819220

Garry Lee - Sycamore Drive: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Sycamore_Drive/Sycamore_Drive/
